column1: From today, Monday 13/07/2020.The use of the mask will be mandatory in open and closed spaces in the Region EVEN IF the (social) distance can be respected.This is as a result of an increase in the number of SARS-CoV-2 positive cases in the Region.Exceptions: while consuming drinks or food in bars and restaurants, participating in sports, while at the beach and in swimming pools.Source (in spanish): https://www.laverdad.es/murcia/mascarilla-ob…(In english): https://murciatoday.com/use_of_face_mask_in_…
Probably be a national rule before much longer.Atb steve

Today (16/07/20), the Regional Government has set out the financial sanctions for non-compliance with the measures to prevent the spread of SARS-CoV-2.In english: https://murciatoday.com/murcia_region_approv…In spanish: https://www.laverdad.es/murcia/directo-rueda…
